snippet: The case heard involves a law calling for a 10-year mandatory minimum sentence for a criminal who “forces any person to accompany him.”
abstract: Supreme Court debates meaning of the word 'accompany' in considering North Carolina bank robbery case that involves federal statute imposing 10-year mandatory minimum sentence when a criminal 'forces any person to accompany him' during a bank robbery or while fleeing.
lead_paragraph: The case heard involves a law calling for a 10-year mandatory minimum sentence for a criminal who “forces any person to accompany him.”

headline.main: Supreme Court Called On to Decipher One Word
headline.print_headline: Justices Called on to Decipher One Word
